item.title: Video editor needed to create 15 second video - Upwork
item.description:
Hi. Looking to create a simple and stylish 15 second HD spot. I will provide the sound and the elements that will go on the screen including the logo, copy, the style / colors, and the fonts. I am looking for someone that is creative and knows how to animate / vibrate words (the copy) and is proficient with transitions.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

item.title: Find and compile guitar solo video from Railbird concert - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a freelancer to find and compile a video of the guitar solo from the Frank Zappa song 'It Just Might Be A One Shot Deal' played during Chris Stapleton's set at Railbird. The video should capture the entire solo and have good audio and video quality. The freelancer will need to search for videos from the Railbird concert and select the one that best showcases the guitar solo. Once the video is found, it should be compiled and delivered in a suitable format.

    Skills required:
    - Strong research skills
    - Attention to detail
    - Video editing
    - Ability to work independently

    Size: Small
    Duration: Under 1 month
    Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 21, 2024 01:42 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Music Video, Video Editing, Videography, Guitar, Video Production
Skills: Music Video, Video Editing, Videography, Guitar, Video Production
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editing and Image Enhancement - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can enhance the quality of a loom video by adding high-quality images as the loom video lowered the word graphics so they are now hard to read. I would like the images to be added and sticky so when the video scrolls down, the images move with the scroll etc or as the video zooms (once) the images will zoom as well.

You will also add the iPhone recording video to the loom video as the video of me talking and place this over the grey circle on the loom video.

The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing software and a keen eye for detail. This project requires the ability to seamlessly integrate images into the video to maintain a professional look. The successful candidate will also need to ensure that the audio quality remains intact. If you have the skills to enhance video quality and are able to work with loom videos, we would love to hear from you.

Relevant skills:
- Video editing
- Image enhancement
- Attention to detail
- Proficiency in video editing software
- Ability to integrate images into videos
- Strong communication skills

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 21, 2024 01:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Photo Editing, Education, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Photo Editing, Education, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 21, 2024 01:16 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over Recording, Male, Female, Spokesperson Video, Content Creation
Skills: Voice-Over Recording, Male, Female, Spokesperson Video, Content Creation
Country: United States

item.title: WANTED: Experienced YouTube Video Editor for Long Form "Talking Head" Style - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

I'm looking for an EXPERIENCED Youtube video editor that is KNOWS how to edit videos in the "TALKING HEAD" format.

This is a long-term position (although part-time). I create 12 videos per month on average.

Here's an example of the type of final video I'm looking for:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BWyaFYOyyABjj3cA9tkjA3DE1_RPdJOq/view

My videos are educational, scripted, and generally between 10 to 20 minutes long.

I'll provide:
- Raw video footage
- Video script
- Screenshots

I'll need you to:
- Cut all silences (make the video flow easily with almost no pauses)
- Add titles
- Add explanation bullet points
- Add transitions
- Add close ups
- Add video effects
- Add sound effects
- Add B-roll
- Add Subscribe/Like prompts
- Stabilize loudness/volume
- Color correct to achieve best color tones

You MUST BE CREATIVE. Use all your editing skills to make the video eye-catching and VISUAL.

If you're interested in applying:
1) Did you watch the sample video I provided and do you feel capable of achieving this result?
2) Provide me with at least 3 examples of videos that you edited yourself, that show your skills on the "talking head" format.
3) Let me know what you usually charge for a 10 minute long video in this format.

Thanks!

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 21, 2024 01:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Final Cut Pro, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Final Cut Pro, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Exciting Opportunity: YouTube Video Production Expert for Travel Niche - Upwork
item.description:
Exciting Opportunity: YouTube Video Production Expert for Travel Niche

Position: YouTube Video Production Expert

Job Type: Contractor

Location: Remote

About Us:
Are you an expert in producing high-quality content for the travel niche? Join our dynamic and rapidly growing YouTube channel dedicated to exploring the world and sharing unforgettable travel experiences. We are seeking a talented YouTube Video Production Expert to help us produce engaging content that inspires our audience and drives channel growth. This is a long-term partnership opportunity for someone with proven experience in creating successful YouTube content.

Responsibilities:

Title/SEO: Craft compelling and optimized video titles and descriptions to maximize reach and engagement in the travel niche.
Script Writing: Develop original and engaging scripts for our travel videos, ensuring all content is unique and free from plagiarism.
Voice Over: Provide clear, professional voiceovers that match the adventurous and informative tone of our channel.
Video Editing: Edit videos to produce polished, high-quality travel content that is at least 10 minutes long.
Thumbnail Design: Design eye-catching thumbnails that attract viewers and enhance click-through rates.
Requirements:

Proven experience in producing and growing YouTube content, preferably in the travel niche.
Excellent writing and script development skills.
Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro).
Strong voiceover skills with a professional and engaging delivery.
Graphic design skills for creating attractive thumbnails.
Ability to meet deadlines and consistently produce high-quality content.
Ability to either complete all requirements themselves or have an available team to meet the needs of this position.
Must provide samples of previous work.
What We Offer:

Long-term partnership with consistent work.
Opportunity to be part of a growing and dynamic travel content team.
Competitive compensation based on experience and performance.
How to Apply:
If you have the skills and experience we are looking for, we'd love to hear from you! Please submit your proposal on Upwork with your resume, a cover letter detailing your experience, and samples of your previous work.

We look forward to seeing your work and potentially welcoming you to our travel adventure team!

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 21, 2024 00:57 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, YouTube Thumbnail, SEO Keyword Research, Voice-Over, Content Creation, YouTube Automation, YouTube SEO, YouTube Monetization
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, YouTube Thumbnail, SEO Keyword Research, Voice-Over, Content Creation, YouTube Automation, YouTube SEO, YouTube Monetization
Country: United States
click to apply
